original_title: Roy Chubby Brown: Saturday Night Beaver
overview: Sit back and steady yourself for another large portion of the man in the patchwork suit. Roy "Chubby" Brown is back with a vengeance. Filmed live in Sheffield, this stand-up genius is taking no prisoners in a full frontal assault on your undercarriage. So, put your feet up and settle back for an hour of rip-roaring laughter - you won't be able to take your eyes off his finely polished helmet.
tagline: Outrageous stand-up live at Sheffield City Hall
title: Roy Chubby Brown: Saturday Night Beaver
